sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbatchopert ( BATCH_OPERT_ID /* */ , BATCH_OPERT_NM /* */ , BATCH_PROGRM /* */ , PARAMTR /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #batchOpertId# /* */ , #batchOpertNm# /* */ , #batchProgrm# /* */ , #paramtr# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbatchopert SET BATCH_OPERT_ID=#batchOpertId# /* */ , BATCH_OPERT_NM=#batchOpertNm# /* */ , BATCH_PROGRM=#batchProgrm# /* */ , PARAMTR=#paramtr# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE BATCH_OPERT_ID=#batchOpertId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BATCH_OPERT_ID /* */ , BATCH_OPERT_NM /* */ , BATCH_PROGRM /* */ , PARAMTR /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbatchopert WHERE BATCH_OPERT_ID=#batchOpertId# /* */

SELECT BATCH_OPERT_ID /* */ , BATCH_OPERT_NM /* */ , BATCH_PROGRM /* */ , PARAMTR /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbatchopert WHERE 1=1
BATCH_OPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BATCH_OPERT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbatchopert WHERE 1=1
BATCH_OPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
